title: Enhance wait_for_transaction_confirmation
description:
Add advanced monitoring capabilities to wait_for_transaction_confirmation:
- Detect replaced transactions by same nonce
- Return transaction reverted status after mining
- Provide block timestamp for timing reference
- Show progress during multi-confirmation waits

title: US-001: Add replaced transaction detection
description:
As a user, I want to know if my transaction was replaced by another transaction so that I can track the new transaction hash.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Track transactions with the same nonce
- [ ] Return `replacedBy` field containing the new transaction hash if detected
- [ ] Update documentation to explain replaced transaction behavior
- [ ] pnpm format:check passes
- [ ] pnpm build passes
- [ ] pnpm test passes

title: US-002: Add reverted status detection
description:
As a user, I want to know if my transaction reverted after being mined so that I can understand why it failed.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Check transaction status after confirmation
- [ ] Return `status: 'reverted'` if transaction failed
- [ ] Return `revertReason` field with error message if available
- [ ] Maintain backwards compatibility with success status
- [ ] pnpm format:check passes
- [ ] pnpm build passes
- [ ] pnpm test passes

title: US-003: Add block timestamp to response
description:
As a user, I want the block timestamp in the confirmation response for timing information.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Return `blockTimestamp` field in confirmation response
- [ ] Include timestamp in both success and reverted transactions
- [ ] Format timestamp as Unix epoch (seconds)
- [ ] pnpm format:check passes
- [ ] pnpm build passes
- [ ] pnpm test passes

title: US-004: Add progress percentage display
description:
As a user, I want to see progress percentage when waiting for multiple confirmations.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Calculate progress based on confirmations_received / confirmations_required
- [ ] Emit progress events/logs during waiting period
- [ ] Show percentage at 25%, 50%, 75%, 100% milestones
- [ ] Only show progress when confirmations > 1
- [ ] pnpm format:check passes
- [ ] pnpm build passes
- [ ] pnpm test passes
